* Vim inspired notes app
	* Used to basic idea of vim pretty easy

* m open menu
	* Add block
	* 24 hour time

* back to menu
	* Modify

* Just a buffer
	* Must be saved first

* Remove

* All stored in regular files

* Scroll through days
	* Do from f instead

* Commands
	* day
	* Shows selected day
	* Quicker to show week

* Criticisms
	* Enter to open day
	* Having binding to add block
		* Modify and delete don't need to be in it
		* Scroll i and dd
	* Visual mode
	* Yanking Pasting
	* Always show day
	* No planning week ahead
